author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و کذلک فانظر فی کلّ شیء من الأشیآء ثمّ اشکر ربّک بما ذکرک فی هذا اللّوح البدیع الحمد للّه مالک العرش العظیم
translation: All other things are subject to this same principle of moderation. Render thanks unto thy Lord Who hath remembered thee in this wondrous Tablet. All-Praise be to God, the Lord of the glorious throne.
